item.title: Grow Database File in SQL
item.description: I use both SQL Express 2005 on a server and SQL 2008 on another server. The following script is nice to manually grow a file. By default, SQL auto-grows database files by 10% when it runs low on space. In most cases this is fine, but Iâ€™m a perfectionist and hate receiving errors about low DB Space in my SCE (System Center Essentials) console. use OperationsManager declare @dbname nvarchar(300)
